Articles.Content:
Sorry Guys! Forgot about Pwings entirely, changed the craft prefix now

Pictures (As embedding HTML is off right now)

http://imgur.com/a/55a8f

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Note: The KRF Waterbird requires Ferram Aerospace Research and Procedural Wings.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This craft was initially built as a training aircraft for use in Takeoff / Landing Practice and Evasive maneuvers Practice, however, the waterbird is not an aerobatic plane.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Action Groups: 1 (extend flaps), 2 (retract flaps), 3 (back gear brakes).

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Commision (download) Craft: https://www.dropbox.com/s/ujou3urpuy137vd/Waterbird.craft

Edited September 4, 2013 by life_on_venus
Incorrect mod requirements
Woa, where did you get those 'stock' wings?

Craft Loading Error

Craft OplyMove 01 Trainer was not loaded

becuase

it had the following parts missing:

Proceduralwing2
So, it is not stock, it uses the procedural wing's mod. :/

sorry, forgot about the pwings mod I've updated the thread.

Edited September 6, 2013 by life_on_venus
